questions.questionText: What is the primary purpose of an epoch in the IOTA network?

answerOptions.answerText: To keep the validator set and stakes constant for a fixed period.
To allow users to withdraw their tokens.

questions.questionText: When does reconfiguration occur in the IOTA network?

answerOptions.answerText: At the beginning of each epoch.
At the end of each epoch.

questions.questionText: What happens during the validator set change at the end of an epoch?

answerOptions.answerText: Pending staking and unstaking requests are finalized.
The gas fee structure is modified.
